alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Sanilac; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 02 at 4:52PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SANILAC...LAPEER...AND ST. CLAIR COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by wind gusts of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 451 PM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Applegate to near Brown City to near Otter Lake and moving southeast at 25 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Croswell, Port Sanilac and Applegate around 455 PM EST. Brown City and Lexington around 500 PM EST. Lapeer and Melvin around 515 PM EST. Yale and Lum around 525 PM EST. Metamora around 530 PM EST. Imlay City and Emmett around 540 PM EST. Dryden around 545 PM EST. Almont around 555 PM EST. This includes the following highways... I-94 between mile markers 267 and 273. I-69 between mile markers 149 and 199. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
